column5: Hello everyone, been a while since I posted, havent been out fishing alot latley, but manage to troll the board from time to time. I've been trying to figure out if the older 5hp nissan motors have the gas tank built into the motor themselves? When I check websites all I can find is new motors, and it seems 4hp max have the gas can, but what I want is to find if the older circa 1995 come with the gas tank. Anyone ever have one? do they exist? know of any for sale? I'd like to throw one on the back of my porta-bote for them back lakes. Thanks Greg Sheppard.
I have a 95 nissan 5hp with a built in tank. They do exist.
Thanks Bowslayer. I should have added...those years are they 2 or 4 stroke? which one do you own? Anyone know of any for sale by chance?
the one I have is a 2 stroke ,not sure if they had a 4 stroke model back then (95)
okay thats good to know. I'll keep diggin. Thanks. I just prefer not to bring the mix stuff.
